info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: Visit this url for more information on the input, options, and output of this component: https://github.com/LearnSphere/WorkflowComponents/blob/dev/ComponentCreator/info.md (Drag this component to the workflow, open the options, and scroll down to copy the url.)
info.inputs: zip - Zipped directory of the scripts for the new component.
info.outputs: zip - Zipped directory containing files necessary for a new component.

options.a: Info on the Component Creator options
